Service Details: - Helps parents build healthy lifelong relationships with their children - Offers interactive parenting and life skills sessions to acquire knowledge and learn new strategies in the areas of parenting - Offers group support training sessions and weekly in home visits from a family support worker
Eligibility: Parents with children 2 years of age and older
How to Apply: Referrals accepted from: - Ministry of Children and Family Development- Alcohol & Drug Centre - Public Health - Other community agencies - Self referrals
Address & Map: 1390 KLO RdKelowna, BC     V1W 3P6View MapQuest Map
